title: The Challenge of change
brief_description: This video with accompanying trainer’s manual sets out to provide participants undertaking the training program with the knowledge and skills which will enable them to fully understand the impact, both positive and negative, of significant change in their work situation and how this impact may affect their interpersonal relationships both at work and in their family and social life.
